I'm not crazy about the wide angle lens - sometimes distorts photos around the edges. The zoom is very powerful and I get nice sharp shots with it. Sometimes zoom lenses result in shaky photos, but so far have had good luck with that.I like the HD video. Very sharp, but sometimes hear the motor noise in the recordings.I bought this camera used so it was a good deal.

Reviews.Title: A photo work horse
Reviews.Author: Daniel Sklut
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these cameras to replace my wifes Olympus Stylus which broke when she dropped it. This camera does all that the stylus did and more. The 24X optical zoom is a lot of zoom for such a small camera. The video is far superior to the Stylus as is the ability to take photos indoors in low light conditions, without a flash. I was impressed enough with it to buy five more for my staff members. It is a good value at the price. I am very pleased with it. 5 Stars for this camera!

Reviews.Title: Good pocket sized camera
Reviews.Author: TJC
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good quality camera that is easy to use and takes very good pictures. The 24x zoom is very good and quick.The battery life is very good and an extra battery is very inexpensive on Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: James Swyryt "Jim S"
Reviews.Content: This is a really great camera , it has the  things you need to take a prefect picture good job

Reviews.Title: In Awe
Reviews.Author: Tiara Bronson
Reviews.Content: I've had a very crappy camera for a while and I decided to purchase this one. It arrived today and I'm absolutely satisfied. Zoom is amazing, the crisp clear photos are so amazing, and the size is good along with the quality. 100% satisfied!

Reviews.Title: excellent product.
Reviews.Author: francis lizmer figuera godoy
Reviews.Content: excellent product. remains broadly satisfied with everything that makes the camera. an incredible price. totally recommend it. the zoom is phenomenal

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the product!
Reviews.Author: eloy
Reviews.Content: I was delivered at the right time.Everything came with it as advertised.The camera works beautifully on every scene I have tested it, night, panoramic, zoom, etc.I would recommend the product, it's a great value for money.

Reviews.Title: It¨s my second Olympus, I Like it
Reviews.Author: MaxPauly
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, very sharp and clear photos, you can lower the level of compression of the photos to increase quality. It seems a very suitable size and weight, although my wife seems something big. Q I have to use it more to see all its virtues and limitations, so far very well.

Reviews.Title: Total Satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Daniel Philpot
Reviews.Content: Total Satisfaction with the Olympus SZ-12 14MP Digital Camera.  My wife cant put it down, she is very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Yadamjav
Reviews.Content: Love the features, looks so professional and at the same time, simple. Perfect for me. I suggest everyone to buy it, i mean if you're not that professional but don't like simple cameras

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera and pictures:
Reviews.Author: T. Wade
Reviews.Content: I needed a lighter, less expensive camera to take on my daughter's field trip so I wouldn't have to lug around the more expensive dslr and lenses around, so this was kind of a last minute, spur of the moment purchase for me. Thank goodness for amazon prime and their two day shipping. It got here just in time and the battery was already charged for me, so that was a nice plus too. I was really hesitant to NOT take my "real" camera since I knew we were going to aquarium, but I also knew I'd regret it if anything happened to damage it, so this was a compromise. I thought it did great for taking pictures of the scenery and the city- even as we were driving by. It also did pretty well in nicely lit areas. The only time I was kicking myself for leaving the dslr at home was in the aquarium. No matter what settings I used or tweaked, or even while steadying myself against a wall- I just didn't get many, if any, decent or usable shots. It has a special setting for low light situations- but even that didn't really work very well, not even with the flash employed- it washed everything out. However, I knew that was a possibility, so overall I'm fairly pleased with this camera. It's definitely great for walking around and situations where you don't want your more expensive gear to get possibly damaged or stolen, and I got it for $109 and free shipping- so it was fairly budget friendly to me as well. I think mostly I will let my daughter use it, but I am looking forward to trying out the zoom on the full moon in a week.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best cameras that I've ever owned..  and I've had several very good cameras over the years.  The pictures all come out very clear and nice.  I can even take pictures at night and with all of my other cameras I miserably failed at taking any decent nighttime pictures.  And the 24X zoom on this camera is excellent.  I love being able to zoom in on a subject.

Reviews.Title: Pictures unclear
Reviews.Author: christene gillis
Reviews.Content: The person we bought this from was great, received it in a timely manner at Christmas time. Looked like an expensive camera and my daughter was impressed we she opened her gift. She is a single mom and was very excited to take pictures of her son. The problem was the pictures were very blurry. We tried everything and nothing we did helped make the pictures clearer also we could not get the flash to work all the time.We have since returned the camera to the whom we purchased through Amazon and are waiting to hear from her.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: S. Winalis "Coconut Cowboy"
Reviews.Content: All I can say is zoom  zoom  zoom……Definitely worth the investment for the amount of camera you get. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality
Reviews.Author: JANINE CROUCH
Reviews.Content: Very nice photos of the moon.  Has a neat couple of features.  Would definitely recommend for the price.  Good battery life.

Reviews.Title: bought these cameras to myself and both parents
Reviews.Author: NGB
Reviews.Content: this is my third camera, does a superb job filming and taking picture, I would dare to say a better job than a fancy sony camera bought years ago for over $1,500.00. Easy to to use, love to use it every where, perfect for the beach, no much worries about the sand and salt for the price. Cannot bit it

Reviews.Title: Best Zoom
Reviews.Author: cspaniel
Reviews.Content: Previously had this camera for years-liked it so well, purchased another.  Great zoom for price and easy to use.  Clarity is also great.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Stacey Dahms
Reviews.Content: Very nice for the price and a real nice zoom.  Still getting used to the features of this camera, but it was exactly what I was hoping for and more.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jim curry
Reviews.Content: an excellent camera to stick in a pocket when traveling about, good zoom feature. nave brand good lense and you can't go wrong in this price range

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera. Recommended
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: This camera let me take really awesome pictures without flash, percet for visits to the museums and landscape. the quality of the pictures are incredible . The only problem is that this camera has a high battery consumption  without the flash mode, the mode needed  for take pictures in museums .This camera is very easy to use . Absolutelly pleased with my purchase and totally recommended

Reviews.Title: Gift for my wife.
Reviews.Author: Dean Krause
Reviews.Content: She is really into this camera. Although she isn't very tech-y, she is trying. So far it is quite easy to operate, gives good quality with little effort. There are a ton of features available that we have not tried. I've used it some, and wanted to take some time exposures(long duration shutter opening) but it apparently does not have that ability. Most digitals I have encountered in this price range do not have that feature.There are several options to have a timer release the shutter so you can be in the shot, and a multitude of special effects, f-stop adjustments, etc..  The shape of the camera makes it easy to hold, but it is also relatively compact. I carry a small Casio camera that fits easily in my pocket, but it doesn't have near the zoom capacity, nor the grasp-ability of this Olympus SZ-12.Overall, if you don't want a lot of extras, it is still easy to use. If you DO want those extras, they are available.

Reviews.Title: Excellent  point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: Bradley Lyons
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother for Christmas.  She has a couple of other Olympus Point and shoots, one film and one digital.  Their build and optical quality have always impressed me.  This one is no different.  Image quality is outstanding, the zoom is fast and sharp and ease of use is amazing.  I am a DSLR shooter myself, but I would not hesitate to carry one of these with me if I was cramped for space.  Maybe, even if I wasn't.  It is just so easy to use.  Two thumbs up; more, if I had them.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera for what we needed
Reviews.Author: Bobcat250
Reviews.Content: Camera was just what was needed for our work. We are a newspaper and all reporters are required to have cameras. This filled the bill just right.

Reviews.Title: The Best $110.00 you will ever spend!
Reviews.Author: Michael Gabriel "MG"
Reviews.Content: I finally found a compact digital camera that takes darned good pictures and has lot's of features.  You can't beat the great price on Amazon.  This camera has an awesome battery life, is light-weight and has an awesome zoom lens.  I like the built-in lens protector and it is compact enough to put in your pocket.  I did also purchase the Case Logic DCB-302 and this camera fits perfect in the case.  I highly recommend this camera, especially with the amazing price-point.  You can't go wrong with this camera, it would make a great gift for Christmas!  I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: John Stebbins
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for the money. settings are more intuitive and easier to use and understand. Can't really beat it for the price.

Reviews.Title: All We Need- and more.
Reviews.Author: MMH
Reviews.Content: Second one of these I've ordered- this one is for the office.  Very easy to use especially for the non-professional.  Perfect size, well constructed and great pictures.  We take them on high resolution and then use a program to resize them if we need to email them etc.  Great camera.

Reviews.Title: better then expected, good for the money
Reviews.Author: Cj
Reviews.Content: before this I had a canon S95 which took awesome pictures, but it eventually broke (twice) in much to short of a time (in my opinion.... and after I babied it) so i decided not to get another camera that expensive. This one is easy to use, takes good pictures for a mom to a 2 year old. Easy to charge (just got back from a week at disney, plugged it in a couple times over night when I charged my phone, no big deal). So far it seems to be holding up. Its nothing that I am super excited about, but the pictures are clear, easy to take, and the camera is functional at a reasonable price. For me that gets 5 stars, but I'm no photographer so if you are looking for something super professional this probably isn't it-- otherwise it works great for a family point & shoot

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera
Reviews.Author: Clifford J. Goniea "Datamonger"
Reviews.Content: My wife has had me purchase this camera three times now. They make great gifts! Camera was delivered quickly and works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! A must have!
Reviews.Author: Marvin T. Gammon
Reviews.Content: Is as feature rich as described. All kinds of professional settings just like a camera that would cost over $300.00 more. Well worth your money!

Reviews.Title: Husband loves it
Reviews.Author: A.T.G.
Reviews.Content: Easy to follow and use camera for the average user.  Basic settings and even more advanced settings for those who want to explore more options.

Reviews.Title: A super little camera!
Reviews.Author: Maine Boy
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera a few days ago and am very happy with it!  I have been fiddling around with it to get used to it.  Thank heavens for digital photography and rechargeable batteries - I don't have to worry about wasting money on film and batteries.  I have been taking some pictures around the area to get used to it and find it really easy to use.  The camera has great capabilities but it is also very easy to use for basic shooting.  The camera seems to go from off to fully on (booted up) in about a second.  Focusing seems to be very fast also although I think it will be slower in low light.  A full set of instructions come with the camera on a DVD.  Directions are complicated but I think new users just need to take their time and gradually familiarize themselves with its different options.  Some people mention that the flash has to be popped up to work while many cameras have the flash pop up automatically when needed.  I don't find this a problem.  If I want to use flash, I pop it up and the camera will only use it if necessary.  If I don't want flash at all I leave it down and the camera will not use it.  The viewing screen is very bright and clear outdoors in bright sunlight, which can be a problem for many similar cameras.  This camera has about five different brightness settings for the display and I set mine to the brightest.  Even with the sun shining over my shoulder directly on to the screen I could clearly see the picture.  For years I have been using bigger and more complicated digital cameras.  Before that, for many years, I have used everything in film photography from 1/2 frame 35mm to 8X10 view cameras.  I am really happy with this little camera and think it is the perfect choice for me.  It has many different options if I want to use them but it is also an excellent point-and-shoot camera with a very long zoom lens.  Because of its small size, this little gem is really easy to carry around without the need for large, heavy camera bags.  I bought this camera in bright red to satisfy the Walter Mitty side of me.  I really think anyone looking for a great, little all-around digital camera for almost all photography will be very happy with this camera.  Just be sure to give yourself and the camera a break and don't expect to be familiar with every aspect of the camera in a few minutes.  This is true with any digital camera.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: I Wish
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Buford
Reviews.Content: I wish I had received simple one page printed instructions for a novice user.  I could not use the DVD on my computer.I found this same camera for a cheaper price at Sam's club!

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I love the small size, easy to use and lots of features. Still have to read up on some of the great things it can do.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Bea
Reviews.Content: I was very excited, came on time ...great little camera that's all I needed it. Will recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: pictures
Reviews.Author: garret hecker
Reviews.Content: Got my camera in reasonable time and it works great.  It was a good price as well.  I enjoy the zoom ability of it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: T. Hein "TAGS Fan"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera with great features including the fantastic zoom!  I wish it would have come with a manual, so I haven't figured out all the features yet but it seems to be working well.  I just took it on a cruise and the photos were beautiful!

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Bob Meyers
Reviews.Content: I very much like the look and feel of this small camera. Also, works great and is easy to sync with my computer. I recommend this Olympus!

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto
Reviews.Author: Yazalde Amaya
Reviews.Content: Buen Tamaño, funcionalidad sencilla, imagenes nítidas, excelente embalage, fácil de usar, vendedor excelente atención y envío rápido, recomendado 100 %.

Reviews.Title: Absolute Love
Reviews.Author: jmk12489
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. I have a 6-month old that is constantly moving & in any light I get perfect unblurred photos. I can take a close up of anything & it is amazing.

Reviews.Title: I like it because of the weight. I have use of my right hand only.
Reviews.Author: elizabeth sutton
Reviews.Content: I am still trying to learn how to use it. I have a friend that has one so I am going to get her to help me.The book is ok but it takes time to learn how to use the camera. Make the book much simpler and give me the option of printing it or getting if by snail mail.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: ljtibbs99
Reviews.Content: we got the camera fast.  it records in high def and it look great. when you turn it on it starts up quickly.  you can also record quickly with one touch.  it is a nice and small size that fits into my purs. i love this camera it is easy to use.  it has the 24X optical zoom that is one of the main reasons i bought this item and it work great.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: prometheus
Reviews.Content: I received the camera sooner than I had expected. I bought it as a Mother's Day present for my mom (obviously) !! She just loves the camera.. She tells me that its compact and easy to use. So far she is in love with it.. The zoom feature is definitely an added feature for her.. I did look at the camera and found the extra shooting options really cool.. All in all its a great camera..

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Roger J. Ballenger
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for the zoom and the price.  We are really disappointed in the quality of the photos and video.  We ultimately bought the Sony DSC-HX50V - it's quite a bit more $$, but, well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: John Gray
Reviews.Content: I'm the type who doesn't want to take time for adjusting settings.  I want to point and shoot.  This camera does it, pretty well, except at extended zoom, or in low light conditions.  Near the limit of the optical zoom, focus is poor.  Without the flash, in low light, the images become unacceptably grainy.  With the flash, colors are washed-out.  In my amateur opinion, where it excels is in accurately depicting color and contrast, under 'normal' light conditions.  Overall, considering the price, it's pretty good.  If you know your way around camera settings, then it's probably even better.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I know for the price range not to expect the greatest camera.  Takes good vibrant pictures and is easy to use, but it feels way cheap.  Battery/SD compartment feels as if it can be broken easily. On the first outing the screen was scratched easily, where as another camera we've had for years is unscathed.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: beth messner
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small digital to carry around easier than my slr.  Size is great. Although I have not used the camera much yet, I am traveling soon and look forward to testing it.

Reviews.Title: instructions
Reviews.Author: calbob
Reviews.Content: I bought this camers, and haved started to use it. BUT cannot find a manual that can help with all the buttons etc..I am wondering if I just didn't get one in the box, but trying to work it out without instructions is a little daunting & disappoining for a Blonde Senior...debating if I should send it back! any feedback ? I checked at the Olympus site, and they inform me its a 80 page print download..Yikes!

Reviews.Title: Not A Love Affair
Reviews.Author: Herbguy
Reviews.Content: Have been using the camera now for a couple of weeks and have not fallen in love with it. Maybe we are still in the learning stage, but our other point and shoot camera witha 14x zoom is much easier to use and so far takes much better pics.

Reviews.Title: Olympus SZ-12
Reviews.Author: RAM
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the quality of the pictures I have so far taken.Has worked well in low-light as well.

Reviews.Title: SZ 12
Reviews.Author: Stephanie A. Perry
Reviews.Content: Great camera it is easy to use and small yet does so much. I like the red camera.thank you very much

Reviews.Title: This thing is fantastic
Reviews.Author: CamdenNJReader
Reviews.Content: Its light, it fits in your pocket and it is easy to understand the basic process of taking and viewing pictures.  It is miles ahead of its predecessor zoom models.  This camera recharges off of your computer which saves about $800.00 per year off the cost of AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Zoom on a Point and Shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Chelle "always reading"
Reviews.Content: After using this little camera, I've been accused of being a professional photographer.  It is super easy and intuitive, and the panoramic shots are perfection.  The only 'con' is that the camera doesn't come with a neck strap.  Otherwise this is a perfect little camera for a multitude of shots.

Reviews.Title: NOT a wi-fi camera! Repeat NO wifi !!!
Reviews.Author: S. Gordon "scottst"
Reviews.Content: I specifically searched Amazon for Wi-Fi cameras. The description below is a little misleading. We go this camera and there is NO wi-fi. You have to buy a wi-fi SD card to use it for wifi, Which you can do with any other camera. This is NOT a wi-fi camera! Repeat NO wifi !!! It's mislabeled if you search parametrically using Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Joni M. Sisto
Reviews.Content: Camera description states it has stabilization so you can take clear pictures even if the objects moves.  This isn't the case.  I have taken many pictures of my grandchildren and if they move a little the picture is blurry.  I am very disappointed with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Not too impressed by the pictures this takes
Reviews.Author: mike wilson
Reviews.Content: I have a DSLR, but wanted a super zoom that I could throw in my pocket to take random candids with.  I landed on this after a fair amount of review reading, but I really haven't been impressed with the quality of the pictures from this.  I'm not sure that it's really much worse than any other average point-n-shoot camera, but it's definitely blown away by my low-mid range DSLR.  I'll keep it around, but if I had a time machine I'd probably tell myself just to lug the DSLR around instead of buying this thing.  I guess this review is as close to a time machine as I can get, so if you actually want good pictures, use a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for price
Reviews.Author: RMWarner
Reviews.Content: I like the camera alot. It takes good pics from what I seen. I haven't bought a SD card yet. I need to try the HD camera. It would have been nice if they would have had a charger to go with it other then in the camera. Got it from olympus directly and had to pay sales tax. The speed can be set to take alot of pictures in a second. The IB software worked but not Viewer 2. Going to call tomorrow and see if I can fix that.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Pictures
Reviews.Author: Dee Em "DeeEm"
Reviews.Content: I returned this item to Amazon less than two weeks after purchasing it.I've owned several Olympus cameras and actually believed that they couldn't make a dysfunctional camera.  I've even bragged to friends and family that owned other makes what fools they were to not buy Olympus.Well…."Me Thinks Thou Protest Too Much!"  Yes, indeed I surely discovered that Olympus does not make great cameras all the time.The picture quality is terrible.  It takes too long to take multiple pictures back to back.  I was really disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera; great price
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera for a few months now; it works perfectly. There is a lot of zoom for the price I paid. I recommend this family camera, especially for $100.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift.. Happy with my purchase!!
Reviews.Author: Kelli Avery "Say what you Mean, Mean what you...
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 17 year old. It will be her first "better quality" camera. She has recently taken an interest in photography, and I bought this one because of the shutter effect. I also like that it has a little lever that opens the flash when needed and it hides away when not in use. The screen size if nice for viewing. The feel and weight of the camera is nice. Doesn't feel flimsy. Comes with USB cords and Video cables. Wrist strap, installation CD and eye-fi capable. Pretty sure this is going to bring some pretty smiles Christmas morning!

Reviews.Title: Did not read all the information about the camera
Reviews.Author: Maxine Bogan
Reviews.Content: After reading all information and using this on vacation it a pretty good camera. Would recommend to others to buy

Reviews.Title: Very good quality...
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Arias
Reviews.Content: I like it a lot... but I struggle a little bit with all the features...The user's manual is digital..

Reviews.Title: NOT impressed!!!
Reviews.Author: Robyn Demeuse
Reviews.Content: The features for scenes listed sound great.  Worked well on my Olympus VR-340 that I replaced this camera with.  However, on the SZ-12, those features I loved on the VR are a real bummer.  They don't work.  Pet scene - camera focuses on whatever it sees first and snaps the pictures before you even have a chance to aim it at your pet.  Does reduce the "green eye" you get from pets but be ready to point and aim fast to get the picture you want.  Sunset doesn't work that swell either.  I've had the most luck using auto or landscape.  I liked that this camera had a better zoom that was reached farther than the VR-340 even though I was not gaining higher mega-pixels.  I was actually going down in pixel size vs the newer VR camera model has to offer.  THe zoom does work well and does make for nice clear shots.  At the same time, be a super steady hand because it does waver badly until it steadies itself.  In all, its a great camera for better zoom but the pile of scene features stink because they do not work no where near as well as promoted.  For an all around snapshot camera that takes impecable pictures, I like the VR models better.

Reviews.Title: Nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: Kathy Woodville
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a SZ-14 but I had to send it back because it had internal memory problems and that model was not available so I opted for the SZ-12 which was actually more expensive that the SZ-14. After taking 41 photos this camera also errored with "memory full" so obviously this one has the same problem. This camera also has to be sent back. Obviously I am not going to try replacing this one with another similar camera by Olympus. I think I will stick to my Canon's and Minolta's.

Reviews.Title: Camera purchased as gift
Reviews.Author: Pat Wulf
Reviews.Content: Did not received comments, complaints etc. from recipient so I believe the product performed as it should. It must be okay.

Reviews.Title: Nightmare Camera
Reviews.Author: unduki
Reviews.Content: I bought a camera on 9-26-12.  I took it to a four day festival and it froze up the entire time.  I missed so many great moments.  I tried to return it but Olympus tells me I have to send my camera to them in New York at my expense.  It will take 2-3 weeks for them to get it back to me.  So, for $250, I've got nothing.  No camera to photograph my grandchildren at Halloween, or my dogs, or my plants (I'm a horticulturist) or my visitors?  Maybe I'll have one for Christmas so I can take pictures of me with my new grandson when I go to visit them at Ft. Drum, NY before my son deploys to Afghanistan again.  Really?  I hate this camera.  I hate Olympus.

Reviews.Title: Not a very good camera!
Reviews.Author: Coach lover
Reviews.Content: Purchased this because of the long  zoom, I was sadly disappointed. I do have another Olympus which my husband hates but it is waterproof and that is why I bought it and I could not return it. This camera took horrible pictures that were pix-elated. The zoom pictures were even worse. I do not recommend this camera when there are others small cameras out there with long zooms. I replaced it with the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX30V, now this is one heck of a camera. Don't waste your time or money on this Olympus camera. Even with my other Olympus, I get crappy pix-elated pictures most of the time.

Reviews.Title: menu does not work
Reviews.Author: hl1975
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera planning to use it on a future trip. It looked intimidating and decided to just return it and make do with my iphone camera so I requested a refund several months after purchasing it on amazon but it was past the return date so I had to live with it and figure out how it worked. I took it on vacation only to find out the menu on the camera didn't work. Since I purchased on amazon, it came with no warranty. The seller would not give me a refund because I didn't return it within 2 weeks of purchase and neither would Amazon. Do yourselves a favor and don't purchase anything without a warranty!

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: ina hapke
Reviews.Content: Before this one I had a nice, small Fuji and I was ready to upgrade a bit for my business photos. So I purchased this one, but I am not so happy. The camera is ok. I thought it is more easy to transfer via wifi the pics to the internet and the camera is kind of big. The wide ankle is nice, the zoom too.
